body.p: The Wine development release 1.1.10 is now available.

What's new in this release:
Support for virtual memory write watches.
Workarounds for the WINAPI compiler bug on Mac OS.
Several fixes for the 64-bit build.
Some more GdiPlus functions.
Various bug fixes.

p.p: The source is available now. Binary packages are in the process of being built, and will appear soon at their respective download locations.
